rules.ruleDescription: B hold -> Search menu apps / Skim note
H hold -> HS console / Skim heading

to_if_held_down.shell_command: /opt/homebrew/bin/hs -c 'local ev=require("hs.eventtap"); local t=require("hs.timer"); ev.keyStroke({}, "home"); t.usleep(120000); ev.keyStroke({}, "tab"); t.usleep(120000); ev.keyStroke({}, "end")'

rules.ruleDescription: N hold -> New note / Skim highlight
CAPS - HSLAUNCHER (alone), HYPER (hold), SUPER (with shift), MEH (with ctrl)
SPACE - tap for space, hold for layer
CTRL+OPT+ESC - Activity Monitor (tap) or Force Quit (tap-tap)
RCMD + Key - App launch or focus
